title: Former Super Falcons Goalkeeper Aluko - Olaseni Is Dead
body_text:
Bidemi Aluko-Olaseni, a former Super Falcons of Nigeria goalkeeper, has died.
Aluko-Olaseni died after an eight-year struggle with cancer.
In a post on X, the Nigerian Football Federation (NFF) expressed condolences to her family and wished that she may rest in peace.
â€œWe are sad to hear of the passing of former @NGSuper_Falcons goal keeper, Bidemi Aluko-Olaseni after an eight-year battle with cancer.
â€œOur thoughts and prayers are with the family. May her gentle soul rest in peace,â€ the NFF wrote.
We are sad to hear of the passing of former @NGSuper_Falcons goal keeper, Bidemi Aluko-Olaseni after an eight-year battle with cancer. Our thoughts and prayers are with the family. May her gentle soul rest in peace pic.twitter.com/2l8cxygzrD

From 2012 to 2013, Aluko-Olaseni tended the goalpost for the Super Falcons.
She also represented Rivers Angels in the Nigerian Womenâ€™s Premier League.
